verses.verse: Then Jacob<WH3290> went on<WH5375> his journey<WH7272>, and came<WH3212> into the land<WH776> of the people<WH1121> of the east<WH6924>.

And he looked<WH7200>, and behold a well<WH875> in the field<WH7704>, and, lo, there were three<WH7969> flocks<WH5739> of sheep<WH6629> lying<WH7257> by it; for out of that well<WH875> they watered<WH8248> the flocks<WH5739>: and a great<WH1419> stone<WH68> was upon the well's<WH875> mouth<WH6310>.

And thither were all the flocks<WH5739> gathered<WH622>: and they rolled<WH1556> the stone<WH68> from the well's<WH875> mouth<WH6310>, and watered<WH8248> the sheep<WH6629>, and put<WH7725> the stone<WH68> again<WH7725> upon the well's<WH875> mouth<WH6310> in his place<WH4725>.
And Jacob<WH3290> said<WH559> unto them, My brethren<WH251>, whence<WH370> be ye? And they said<WH559>, Of Haran<WH2771> are we.
And he said<WH559> unto them, Know<WH3045> ye Laban<WH3837> the son<WH1121> of Nahor<WH5152>? And they said<WH559>, We know<WH3045> him.
And he said<WH559> unto them, Is he well<WH7965>? And they said<WH559>, He is well<WH7965>: and, behold, Rachel<WH7354> his daughter<WH1323> cometh<WH935> with the sheep<WH6629>.

And he said<WH559>, Lo<WH2005>, it is yet high<WH1419> day<WH3117>, neither is it time<WH6256> that the cattle<WH4735> should be gathered together<WH622>: water<WH8248> ye the sheep<WH6629>, and go<WH3212> and feed<WH7462> them.

And they said<WH559>, We cannot<WH3201>, until all the flocks<WH5739> be gathered together<WH622>, and till they roll<WH1556> the stone<WH68> from the well's<WH875> mouth<WH6310>; then we water<WH8248> the sheep<WH6629>.
¶ And while he yet<WH5750> spake<WH1696> with them, Rachel<WH7354> came<WH935> with her father's<WH1> sheep<WH6629>: for she kept them<WH7462>.

And it came to pass, when Jacob<WH3290> saw<WH7200> Rachel<WH7354> the daughter<WH1323> of Laban<WH3837> his mother's<WH517> brother<WH251>, and the sheep<WH6629> of Laban<WH3837> his mother's<WH517> brother<WH251>, that Jacob<WH3290> went near<WH5066>, and rolled<WH1556> the stone<WH68> from the well's<WH875> mouth<WH6310>, and watered<WH8248> the flock<WH6629> of Laban<WH3837> his mother's<WH517> brother<WH251>.
And Jacob<WH3290> kissed<WH5401> Rachel<WH7354>, and lifted up<WH5375> his voice<WH6963>, and wept<WH1058>.
And Jacob<WH3290> told<WH5046> Rachel<WH7354> that he was her father's<WH1> brother<WH251>, and that he was Rebekah's<WH7259> son<WH1121>: and she ran<WH7323> and told<WH5046> her father<WH1>.

And it came to pass, when Laban<WH3837> heard<WH8085> the tidings<WH8088> of Jacob<WH3290> his sister's<WH269> son<WH1121>, that he ran<WH7323> to meet<WH7125> him, and embraced<WH2263> him, and kissed<WH5401> him, and brought<WH935> him to his house<WH1004>. And he told<WH5608> Laban<WH3837> all these things<WH1697>.
And Laban<WH3837> said<WH559> to him, Surely<WH389> thou art my bone<WH6106> and my flesh<WH1320>. And he abode<WH3427> with him the space<WH3117> of a month<WH2320>.
¶ And Laban<WH3837> said<WH559> unto Jacob<WH3290>, Because thou art my brother<WH251>, shouldest thou therefore serve<WH5647> me for nought<WH2600>? tell<WH5046> me, what shall thy wages<WH4909> be?
And Laban<WH3837> had two<WH8147> daughters<WH1323>: the name<WH8034> of the elder<WH1419> was Leah<WH3812>, and the name<WH8034> of the younger<WH6996> was Rachel<WH7354>.
Leah<WH3812> was tender<WH7390> eyed<WH5869>; but Rachel<WH7354> was beautiful<WH3303><WH8389> and well<WH3303> favoured<WH4758>.
And Jacob<WH3290> loved<WH157> Rachel<WH7354>; and said<WH559>, I will serve<WH5647> thee seven<WH7651> years<WH8141> for Rachel<WH7354> thy younger<WH6996> daughter<WH1323>.
And Laban<WH3837> said<WH559>, It is better<WH2896> that I give<WH5414> her to thee, than that I should give<WH5414> her to another<WH312> man<WH376>: abide<WH3427> with me.
And Jacob<WH3290> served<WH5647> seven<WH7651> years<WH8141> for Rachel<WH7354>; and they seemed<WH5869> unto him but a few<WH259> days<WH3117>, for the love he had<WH160> to her.
¶ And Jacob<WH3290> said<WH559> unto Laban<WH3837>, Give<WH3051> me my wife<WH802>, for my days<WH3117> are fulfilled<WH4390>, that I may go in<WH935> unto her.
And Laban<WH3837> gathered together<WH622> all the men<WH582> of the place<WH4725>, and made<WH6213> a feast<WH4960>.
And it came to pass in the evening<WH6153>, that he took<WH3947> Leah<WH3812> his daughter<WH1323>, and brought<WH935> her to him; and he went in<WH935> unto her.
And Laban<WH3837> gave<WH5414> unto his daughter<WH1323> Leah<WH3812> Zilpah<WH2153> his maid<WH8198> for an handmaid<WH8198>.

And it came to pass, that in the morning<WH1242>, behold, it was Leah<WH3812>: and he said<WH559> to Laban<WH3837>, What is this thou hast done<WH6213> unto me? did not I serve<WH5647> with thee for Rachel<WH7354>? wherefore then hast thou beguiled<WH7411> me?
And Laban<WH3837> said<WH559>, It must not be so done<WH6213> in our country<WH4725>, to give<WH5414> the younger<WH6810> before<WH6440> the firstborn<WH1067>.
Fulfil<WH4390> her<WH2063> week<WH7620>, and we will give<WH5414> thee this also for the service<WH5656> which thou shalt serve<WH5647> with me yet seven<WH7651> other<WH312> years<WH8141>.
And Jacob<WH3290> did<WH6213> so, and fulfilled<WH4390> her week<WH7620>: and he gave<WH5414> him Rachel<WH7354> his daughter<WH1323> to wife<WH802> also.
And Laban<WH3837> gave<WH5414> to Rachel<WH7354> his daughter<WH1323> Bilhah<WH1090> his handmaid<WH8198> to be her maid<WH8198>.
And he went in<WH935> also unto Rachel<WH7354>, and he loved<WH157> also Rachel<WH7354> more than Leah<WH3812>, and served<WH5647> with him yet seven<WH7651> other<WH312> years<WH8141>.
¶ And when the LORD<WH3068> saw<WH7200> that Leah<WH3812> was hated<WH8130>, he opened<WH6605> her womb<WH7358>: but Rachel<WH7354> was barren<WH6135>.

And Leah<WH3812> conceived<WH2029>, and bare<WH3205> a son<WH1121>, and she called<WH7121> his name<WH8034> Reuben<WH7205>: for<WH3588> she said<WH559>, Surely<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> hath looked<WH7200> upon my affliction<WH6040>; now therefore<WH3588> my husband<WH376> will love<WH157> me.

And she conceived<WH2029> again, and bare<WH3205> a son<WH1121>; and said<WH559>, Because the LORD<WH3068> hath heard<WH8085> that I was hated<WH8130>, he hath therefore given<WH5414> me this son also: and she called<WH7121> his name<WH8034> Simeon<WH8095>.

And she conceived again<WH2029>, and bare<WH3205> a son<WH1121>; and said<WH559>, Now this time<WH6471> will my husband<WH376> be joined<WH3867> unto me, because I have born<WH3205> him three<WH7969> sons<WH1121>: therefore was his name<WH8034> called<WH7121> Levi<WH3878>.

And she conceived<WH2029> again, and bare<WH3205> a son<WH1121>: and she said<WH559>, Now<WH6471> will I praise<WH3034> the LORD<WH3068>: therefore she called<WH7121> his name<WH8034> Judah<WH3063>; and left<WH5975> bearing<WH3205>.
